elements.name: question11
elements.html:
Diagnosis: Malaria

Treatment: A/L and paracetemol

Refer to Health Education on Malaria

Dosage info

5 months - 3 years (≥5 - <15kg): first day 1 tablet followed by 1 more tablet 8 hours later. Then, 1 tablet twice a day (every 12 hours) for 2 more days.

3 - 7 years (15 - <25kg): first day 2 tablets followed by 2 more tablets 8 hours later. Then, 2 tablets twice a day (every 12 hours) for 2 more days.

Emyeezi 5 - emyaaka 3 (okuva ku kilo ≥5 - wansi wa kilo <15): Olunaku olusooka empeke 1 mwongere empeke 1 oluvanyuma lwa saawa 8.Olumala, empeke 1 (Oluvanyuma lwasaaw 12) okumala enaku endala biri.

Emyaaka 3 - okutuuka ku 7 (okuva ku kilo 15 - okukawansi <25kg): Olunaku olusooka mpeke 2mwongero empeke 2 oluvanyuma lwáswaaw 8. Awo muwe empele 2 emirundi 2(buli luvanyuma lwasawa 12)
